Description: Worked flint blade, roughly rectangular in shape, segmented blade, truncated at both distal and proximal ends, broken at the top of the dorsal left lateral, abrupt retouch along the dorsal right lateral. Remains of a dull brown cortex on parts of the dorsal surface. Brownish-beige coloured stone, coarse-grained.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), Mound ß, surface (X)
